programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt returns and partners up with the beautiful Nyah Hall to stop renegade agent Sean Ambrose.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt jumps into spectacular new adventures from Rome to Shanghai as he races to rescue a captured agent.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
programme.desc: Agent Ethan Hunt & his team race against time to stop a dangerous network of rogue operatives turned traitors.

programme.title: The Peacemaker (1997)
programme.desc: A train carrying atomic warheads crashes. Dr. Kelly discovers the accident is part of a plot.

programme.title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A.
programme.desc: The man with the patch is back. His job: wade through L.A.’s ruined landmarks to retrieve a doomsday device.

programme.title: The Hunted
programme.desc: The FBI's tracker is on the trail of a villain who murders people in order to become the subject of a manhunt.

programme.title: First Blood
programme.desc: A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood II
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs.

programme.title: Rambo III
programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join a mission. Trautma is captured. Rambo infiltrates the fortress to save his friend.
